features: 【Plug and play】Thumb drives for Android Phones can plug and play without any software installation. But you have to open the“OTG”function. You can watch the movie. You can also share your photos on social media directly from your usb storage when you take nice pictures during your trip.

Dual USB3.1 Memory Stick Chip Internal Adoption Of The Latest Advanced Chip Magnetic Resistance, High Temperature And X-Ray Resistance, Sturdy Housing, No Need to Worry About File Loss. USB C Thumb Drive is Equipped With 3.0 Ports to Ensure The Read Speed And Write Speed Of the Product. (According to the algorithm of the computer, the memory of the U Disk displayed on the computer will have a certain error.)
【Quality Guarantee】：We promise the free replacement if you meet any issues with our products within 90 days. Just contact us via your order simply.

【Notice】When you use a tablet with a USB-C interface,such as ipad mini. , Please store data through the file management center of the mobile application and ensure that the OTG function of the mobile phone is turned on before use. After the above confirmation, you can plug and play, and you can use it anywhere without WIFI (If the devices with usb-c port do not have "OTG" function. That will not be compatible.)

【3in1】Dual USB 3.0 & USB C Flash Stick 1TB. Compatible with OTG enabled devices. With USB C interface and micro USB interface, you can use this USB C flash. It is usually used for storage, data backup and computer file transmission, which can meet your daily needs for photo, music, video, file storage and transmission at work, school, home and travel. (The USB interface is two-in-one. Before inserting it into the computer, press the interface tightly with your finger before inserting it)
body.description: 1TB 3.1 Flash Dirve for Android Phones USB C Date Storage Dirves Warm Tips: Dual Type C Thumb Drives is Compatible with Tablets or Smartphones with USB Type-C Port and Support OTG Function. .so the USB Flash Drive's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification. Generally the Default System of USB Flash Drive is exfat Format. The Thumb Drive is made of metal material,due to the fast transmission speed,so It is normal that it has a slight heat during use. please rest assured it does not affect your normal use.Media Formats Supported： Music: M4A / AIFF / CAF / MP3 / WAV Image: GIF / JPG / PNG / JPEG Video: AVI / FLV / M4V / MKV / MOV / MP4 / RMVB Document: DOC / PPT / XLS / XLSX / PDF / HTML / TX

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 251 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'd been looking for a memory stick for my Android phone for a while now. I wanted one with a large capacity at an affordable price and this one fit the bill perfectly. Now I can easily swap photos/documents from my phone to my husband's phone or off-load for safekeeping with ease anytime I want. It's small and very handy to carry with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of crap!
reviews.reviewText: I spent four days copying half a TB to this flash drive. The next day I went to look at the data and add to it and the drive said it had to be formatted and there was no data. I took it out of my laptop to place it in another to see if it was the computer and the flash drive cover easily just came off of the flash drive. Essentially fell apart the first use. I plugged it into another computer and the same thing, it stated it needed to be formatted. Never buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this I finally don’t have to delete my pics on my iPhone and I save memory on my iPhone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Won't work with a phone case
reviews.reviewText: Works fine as long as you take case off...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This device has saved me monthly payments. Don't buy extra storage on your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Failed on first use
reviews.reviewText: What is worse than a product that doesn't work? One the works, then partially fails, then drives you nuts trying to get it to work again. This is that product. File transfers failed 70%, succeeded 30%. Repeated attempts to get all files to load consistently was impossible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was ridiculously cheap for 1TB of storage. It is pretty fast going through USB-C. I like it overall, but I wish it were a little different in the dimensions. I am using this on a MacBook, and when I have the flash drive in, it is just wide enough to block access to my other USB port so I cannot connect anything else or plug in my computer while this flash drive is connected. Other than that, no complaints.
